ComicInfo.Summary:
The Secret of the Little Black Bag!: Louis the barber meets a childhood friend, Andy Decca. Decca is a rising counterfeiter in the mob hierarchy with contempt for the little people. The envious Louis steals his little black bag, containing the secret to his wealth, plates to print money with. The bag, however, is secured by a poison needle.
Partners in Fear!: Two friends try to outrival each other. One has high anxiety, the other goes mad with fear of falling.
Witch Hunter!: Account of relentless witch-finder Matthew Hopkins.
Ghost Writer: Billy Conway kills his ghost writer Foster â€“ just because he wanted to be credited! Conway is visited by a ghostly audience exposing him as the murderer.
The Unwanted Guest!: Englishman Mark Yeaton blackmails his American relatives and moves into their home, indulging in luxuries. He behaves that erratically, because he killed a dog in the war and is haunted by his eternal howling.
ComicInfo.Title: The Secret of the Little Black Bag!; Partners in Fear!; Witch Hunter!; Ghost Writer; The Unwanted Guest!
